DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize pregnancy-induced analgesia might result enhanced descend noxious inhibitory activity .
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy-Induced Analgesia - A Longitudinal Study DNIC
DOC.detailed_description: Pregnancy-induced analgesia describe several study ( Gintzler 1980 ; Sander Gintzler 1987 ; Jarvis et al . 1997 ) . Obvious mechanism underlie pregnancy-induced analgesia involve hormonal change gestation ( Fillingim Ness 2000 ) . Existing study pregnancy peripartum focused standard characteristic nociception , use non-dynamic quantitative sensory test pain threshold/tolerance suprathreshold stimulus ( Goolkasian Rimer 1984 ; Sengupta Nielsen 1984 ; Cogan Spinnato 1986 ; Dunbar et al . 1988 ; Whipple et al . 1990 ; Shapira et al . 1995 ; Saisto et al . 2001 ; Bajaj et al . 2002 ; Carvalho et al . 2006 ; Ohel et al . 2007 ) , relative limitation study afferent nociceptive input produce peripheral nervous system . The two system prime importance pain modulation within CNS inhibitory system ( descend noxious inhibitory control ( DNIC ) ) excitatory system , balance pain heavily influence former ( Godfrey Mackey 2008 ) . The primary aim study use psychophysical test study inhibitory excitatory pain pathway use DNIC paradigm temporal summation longitudinally pregnancy , compare age-matched control group non-pregnant woman . We add In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) sub-population PIA study study control group ( addition study non-pregnant control pregnant woman ) . We study sub population prior egg retrieval procedure short phone survey participant post egg-retrieval . If subject becomes pregnant , would recruit enroll PIA pregnant population cohort .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Cohort : Inclusion criterion participation ( 1 ) woman age 18 45 yr , ( 2 ) nulliparous ASA physical status class I II woman , ( 3 ) singleton pregnancy , ( 4 ) 14 complete week gestational age time enrollment study , ( 5 ) uncomplicated pregnancy , ( 6 ) delivery plan conduct UW/Stanford University . Nonpregnant Control Cohort : Inclusion criterion participation ( 1 ) woman age 18 45 yr , ( 2 ) nulliparous ASA physical status class I II woman , ( 3 ) planning take oralcontraceptives carry hormonalcoated IUD . Noninclusion Criteria : Pregnant Cohort : Noninclusion criterion ( 1 ) multiparous woman , ( 2 ) nonEnglish speak woman ( subject able understand DNIC procedure answer questionnaire ) , ( 3 ) woman unable understand concept VNPS time inform consent ( involve mental health issue ) , ( 4 ) history anxiety depression , chronic consumption opiate , antidepressant , anticonvulsant ; ( 5 ) intake opioids , acetaminophen , NSAIDs 48h prior psychophysical test . Nonpregnant Control Cohort : Noninclusion criterion Pregnant Cohort well ( 6 ) irregular menstrual cycle ( define < 21 day > 35 day ) . Pregnant Cohort : Exclusion criterion pregnancy complicate preeclampsia preterm delivery ( < 37 week gestation ) . Nonpregnant Control Cohort : Exclusion criterion development irregular cycle .
